name: WordPress
description: Explore careers in the WordPress ecosystem while building job-aligned web content, using LLMs responsibly, understanding open-source fundamentals, and navigating full-stack concepts with AI support.
learningObjectives: I can articulate why I'm uniquely interested in WordPress, and what skills I offer the WordPress community.
I understand what jobs WordPress offers, what roles I am best suited for now, and what roles I hope to grow into.
I can create professional web content that is aligned with my job interests using WordPress.
I can use LLMs to produce professional work aligned with my job interests.
I can leverage AI tools to navigate technical concepts around Full Stack WordPress development.
I understand the fundamentals of Open Source development, and how the WordPress community builds on those fundamentals.
I can help a team adopt, scale, and implement new AI tools to improve team outcomes.
